verses.roman:
'nimittāṁśe' kare teṅho māyāte īkṣaṇa
'upādāna' advaita karena brahmāṇḍa-sṛjana

synonyms: nimitta-aṁśe—in the portion as the original cause; kare—does; teṅho—He; māyāte—in the external energy; īkṣaṇa—glancing; upādāna—the material cause; advaita—Advaita Ācārya; karena—does; brahmāṇḍa-sṛjana—creation of the material world.
translation: Lord Viṣṇu, in His efficient aspect, glances over the material energy, and Śrī Advaita, as the material cause, creates the material world.
